parameters.name: AliyunLang
parameters.description: The language. Valid values: zh and en. Default value: zh.

parameters.name: BindResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource bound to the environment, such as the container ID or VPC ID. For a Cloud environment, specify the region ID.

parameters.name: EnvironmentSubType
parameters.description:
The subtype of the environment. Valid values:

*   CS: Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK)
*   ECS: Elastic Compute Service (ECS)
*   Cloud: cloud service

parameters.name: EnvironmentType
parameters.description:
The type of the environment. Valid values:

*   CS: Container Service
*   ECS: Elastic Compute Service
*   Cloud: cloud service

parameters.name: ManagedType
parameters.description:
type of managed: 
- none: not managed. default value of prometheus for ACK.
- agent: managed agent. default value of  promehtues for ASK/ACS/AckOne.
- agent-exproter: maanged agent and exporter. default of prometheus for Cloud.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags of the instance. You can specify this parameter to manage tags for the instance.
